select detail.* from invoicecgdetail detail inner join invoicecg cg on detail.invoiceid = cg.invoiceid where ((cg.InvoiceDate >= #startDate# or #startDate# is null) and (cg.InvoiceDate <= #endDate# or #endDate# is null)) and (([ProductId]>=#psid# or #psid# is null ) and ([ProductId]>=#peid# or #peid# is null )) and ((cg.[SupplierId] >=#csid# or #csid# is null ) and ([ProductId]>=#ceid# or #ceid# is null ))
select * from invoicecgdetail where InvoiceId =(select top 1 InvoiceId from invoicecg where InvoiceCOId=#value# order by InvoiceId desc )
select * from invoicecgdetail where invoiceid = #invoiceId# and productid in(select productid from product where id between #productStart# and #productEnd#)
select * from invoicecgdetail where invoiceid = #invoiceId# and productid in(select productid from product where id <= #productEnd#)
select * from invoicecgdetail where invoiceid = #invoiceId# and productid in(select productid from product where id >= #productStart#)
